name: Space Adventurer (Super-Chief)
description:
Welcome to Space Adventurer! Your home planet is running out of resources and you have to search the Galaxy for the Temporal Klystron, a mythical object, to save them.----

This project is in Alpha and this level 1/3.

----

CONTROLS:

AD and Arrow Keys - Move

W or Up arrow or Space - Jump

S or Down arrow - Look down

E - Heal (takes energy)

Q - Drop inventory item

Left Mouse - Attack (takes energy)

Shift - Sprint (takes energy)

Esc - Pause

C - Open Map

Stand on a glowing platform to set your spawn point(wait until you turn purple).
